episodes.title: Cult expert decodes MAGA
episodes.description: Talk of Donald Trump becoming a dictator is becoming normalized, and even celebrated by elements of the MAGA movement. Dr. Steven Hassan is an expert in cults and brainwashing, and helps explain the cultish nature of Donald Trump’s appeal to his followers. He also discusses how their misguided beliefs can be most effectively challenged by family members and loved ones. Support Against All Enemies here: www.patreon.com/KenHarbaugh Credits: Producer and Host, Ken Harbaugh Producer, Mikel Ellcessor Associate Producer, Isabel Robertson Theme music by Stephanie Kowal & Seowon Hyun Theme music produced by Tony Morales Motion Designer, Joe Vaccarino
